title: How to connect Github Pages to Custom Domain

content: Intro This is showing how to link Github Pages to a Custom Domain, we are using namecheap here. Others, e.g. GoDaddyâ€¦ can apply the same method.
title: How to connect Github Pages to Custom Domain

content: Steps: Buy a domain In Github repository Settings, then Click Page, add the domain you purchased to the â€˜Custom domain boxâ€™ (no â€˜wwwâ€™) Enforce HTTPS (Github) (Optional) Go Dashboard (make sure NAMESERVERS of the domain is set to Basic DNS) Click â€˜Mangeâ€™ button of the domain name you choose Click Advanced DNS For the HOST RECORDS, Add new records Type = CNAME * 1 Host = www Value = username.github.io TTL = Automatic Type = A Records(@) * 4 Host = @ Value = 185.199.108.153, 185.199.109.153, 185.199.110.153, 185.199.111.153 TTL = Automatic Values might have changed since the time of writing. Check offical docs for the most up-to-date values. Remove old Records Done. Visit to the domain and be patient!
title: How to connect Github Pages to Custom Domain
